customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
For Rhemia, a member of the Marechaussee Phantom who's currently on vacation, the comparative calmness of a game of cards also presents a good opportunity to observe people. The intensity of each match must be carefully controlled, and you can't allow your opponent to becomes too invested, striving only to stay in the game. You have to carefully shepherd the game, finding the perfect balance of power and pacing, which in itself is a test of your card skills...
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc:
"Admonishing Instruction" Alhaitham

Learning, thinking, and taking care of business.

customize.name: Thunder Manifestation
customize.desc:
"Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation

As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
